==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etyl}}
{{Han compound|口|令|t1=mouth|t2=order|ls=ic}}.

===Etymology===
Related to {{och-l|令|to order; to command; order}} ({{zh-ref|Wang, 1982}}). Both may be derived from {{och-l|名|name}}: “name” ({{lang|zh|名}}) > “to name; to give (a name to)” ({{lang|zh|命}}) > “to order; to command” > “order; command” > “destiny; fate; lot” > “life” ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).

{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[life]]; [[existence]]; [[state]] of [[living]] {{zh-mw|m,c:條}}

# [[destiny]]; [[fate]]; [[luck]]
# [[order]]; [[command]]; [[instruction]]
# to [[order]]; to [[command]]
# to [[give]] (a title, name to); to [[name]]

* {{sense|life}} {{zh-l|生命}}

==Japanese==

===Kanji===
{{ja-kanji|grade=3|rs=口05}}

====Readings====
{{ja-readings
|goon=[[みょう]] (myō), (''historical'') [[みやう]] (myau)
|kanon=[[めい]] (mei)
|kun=[[いのち]] (inochi), [[みこと]] (mikoto) {{non-joyo-reading}}
}}

====Compounds====
{{der-top|Compounds}}
* {{ja-r|革命|かくめい}}: revolution
* {{ja-r|運命|うんめい}}: fate, destiny
{{der-bottom}}

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|いのち}}
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=いのち}}. Probably a compound of {{etyl|ojp|-}} elements {{compound|lang=ja|sort=いのち|息|tr1=i|t1=breath|pos1=''i'' in compounds, ''iki'' on its own|の|tr2=no|pos2=possessive particle|霊|tr3=chi|t3=spirit, force, soul}}.

Some analyses describe this as a compound using {{m|ja|生|tr=i||life, breath|pos=''i'' in compounds, ''iki'' on its own}} as the initial semantic element. This is equally valid, as {{m|ja|息|tr=iki}} and {{m|ja|生き|tr=iki}} are cognates.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|いのち|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|いのち}}

# [[life]]
# [[lifespan]]
# [[lifetime]]
# [[fate]], [[destiny]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=いのち|figuratively}} the most [[important]] part or [[aspect]] of a thing

=====Synonyms=====
* {{sense|life}} {{ja-r|生命|せいめい}}
* {{sense|lifespan}} {{ja-r|寿命|じゅみょう}}
* {{sense|lifetime}} {{ja-r|生涯|しょうがい}}, {{ja-r|一生|いっしょう}}
* {{sense|fate}} {{ja-r|運命|うんめい}}
* {{sense|destiny}} {{ja-r|天命|てんめい}}
* {{sense|core aspect}} {{ja-r|真髄|しんずい}}

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|みこと}}
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=みこと}}. Compound of {{prefix|lang=ja|sort=みこと|御|tr1=mi|pos1=honorific prefix|言|tr2=koto|t2=word}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref> The ''mi'' prefix is generally limited to extremely high-[[status]] contexts such as [[god]]s or [[emperor]]s.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|みこと|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}} {{non-joyo-reading}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{l|ja|御言}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|みこと}}

# the [[word]]s or [[pronouncement]]s of a [[god]] or an [[emperor]]

===Etymology 3===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|みこと}}
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=みこと}}. Originally a compound of {{prefix|lang=ja|sort=みこと|御|tr1=mi|pos1=honorific prefix|事|tr2=koto|t2=abstract thing|pos2=as opposed to {{l|ja|物}}, ''mono'', “concrete thing”}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|みこと|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}} {{non-joyo-reading}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{l|ja|尊}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|みこと}}

# the [[honorable]], the [[exalted]]
#: Used as a title after the referenced noun when referring to gods, emperors, or other high-status persons.
#* {{RQ:Kojiki|Kami tsu maki}}
#*: {{lang|ja|夜知富許能 迦微能'''美許登'''波}}
#*: {{lang|ja|八千矛の神の'''命'''は}}
#*:: やちほこのかみの'''みこと'''は
#*:: ''Yachihoko no kami no '''mikoto''' wa''
#*::: '''the honorable''' god Yachihoko
#* {{RQ:Manyoshu|Book 20, No. 4408}}
#*: {{lang|ja|波々蘇婆能 波々能美許等波}}
#*: {{lang|ja|柞葉の母の'''命'''は}}
#*:: ははそばのははの'''みこと'''は
#*:: ''hahasoba no haha no '''mikoto''' wa''
#*::: '''the exalted''' mother of the oak leaf
# the [[beloved]], [[dearly]] beloved
#: Similarly used as a title after the referenced noun.
#* {{RQ:Kojiki|Kami tsu maki}}
#*: {{lang|ja|和加久佐能　都麻能'''美許登'''}}
#*: {{lang|ja|若草の妻の'''命'''}}
#*:: わかくさのつまの'''みこと'''
#*:: ''Wakakusa no tsuma no '''mikoto'''''
#*::: '''dearly beloved''' young wife

====Pronoun====
{{ja-pos|pronoun|みこと}}

# [[you]]
# [[that]] [[person]]

=====Usage notes=====
Used ironically from the late {{w|Heian period}}, expressing a sense of mild [[derision]] or [[ridicule]].

===Etymology 4===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|めい}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=めい}} {{m|zh|命|tr=mjæng<sup>H</sup>||command}}. Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} {{m|zh|命|tr=mìng||life, destiny, instruction}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|めい|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|めい}}

# [[fate]], [[destiny]]
# [[life]], [[lifespan]]
# [[order]], [[command]]

=====Synonyms=====
* {{sense|fate}} {{ja-r|運命|うんめい}}
* {{sense|destiny}} {{ja-r|天命|てんめい}}
* {{sense|life}} {{ja-r|生命|せいめい}}
* {{sense|lifespan}} {{ja-r|寿命|じゅみょう}}
* {{sense|order}} {{l|ja|仰}}, {{ja-r|仰せ|おおせ}}; {{ja-r|命令|めいれい}}
